quote: Your victory is right around the corner. Never give up.
author: -Nicki Minaj

quote: I am a fighter. I never give up.
author: -Caster Semenya

quote: Happiness comes in waves it will find you again.
author: -Anonymous

quote: You are enough. You have enough. You do enough.
author: -Anonymous

quote: Self care is how you take your power back.
author: -Anonymous

quote: Accept challenges, so that you may feel the exhilaration of victory.
author: -George S. Patton

quote: Once you choose hope, anything is possible.
author: -Christopher Reeve

quote: Change your thoughts and you change the world.
author: -Norman Peale

quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
author: -Albert Einstein

quote: We learn from failure, not from success.
author: -Bram Stoker

quote: Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.
author: -Helen Keller

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: -Confucius

quote: Happiness is not having what you want. It is appreciating what you have.
author: -Anonymous
